channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s Greenland Gambit Alienates the European Right He Once Inspired
item.description: The U.S. president is losing the goodwill of the very nationalists and conservatives who until recently saw him as an ally.

item.title: New York City sues reality TV producer Jordan McGraw, son of ‘Dr. Phil,’ trying to prevent negative police footage from leaking
item.description: “Intended to highlight the extraordinary work of the NYPD” the series, “Behind the Badge” at times portrayed the NYPD negatively, the lawsuit said.

item.title: ‘Faithless’ — Springsteen’s Latest Hysterical Politics
item.description: Scritti Politti’s ‘Faithless’ — political songwriting done right.

item.title: After 78 years as a founding member, U.S. fully withdraws from WHO—and it owes over $130 million to the UN agency
item.description: Nearly every country in the world is a member.

item.title: Busting Up a Nexus of Narco-Terrorism
item.description: U.S. pressure on the Iran-Venezuela-Cuba crime network will help protect the Western Hemisphere for years to come.

item.title: The Leo Strauss Letter That Previewed a Modern-Day Divide
item.description: As 65-year-old letters between conservative heavyweights reveal, the right’s internecine clashes on foreign policy are nothing new.

item.title: Protesters Who Disrupted Minnesota Church Service Were Practicing Their Own Godless Religion
item.description: Promoting political protest as an act of worship leads only to chaos and tragedy.

item.title: WATCH: Former ICE director reveals what goes into agency’s decisions on cities to target
item.description: Former acting U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement Director John Sandweg shared insight about how the agency selects the next city for operations.

item.title: Canada’s Misguided China Overtures
item.description: We understand why Prime Minister Mark Carney’s pride has been wounded, but we urge him to think harder about the long-term interest of his country.

item.title: ‘Sparkle Beach Ken’ Is Too Kind To Gavin Newsom

item.title: SCOOP: House Republicans revive push to impeach 'activist' judges after Johnson's green light

item.title: Plummeting Murder Rate Shows ‘Law And Order Works’
item.description: A new report shows the nation's murder rate in 2025 is on pace to be at its lowest level since the data started being tracked in 1900.

item.title: Jared Kushner’s dream of a Gaza city full of new skyscrapers clashes with reality of 60 million tons of rubble
item.description: “In the Middle East, they build cities like this ... in three years," Kushner said in a presentation in Davos. “Stuff like this is very doable.”
